bibl.title: The Dossier of Flavia Anastasia, Part One: Document Prescripts. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Six document prescripts from the dossier of Flavia Anastasia, an Oxyrhynchite landholder attested in the last quarter of the sixth century. - 1. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 44. Document addressed to Flavia Anastasia by georgoi from a ktema of hers. September 26, 587. - 2. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 55. Receipt for a charitable benefaction (?). 587/8. - 3. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 58. Document addressed to Flavia Anastasia by Aurelius Kelouch. April 16, 590. - 4. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 41. Document addressed to Flavia Anastasia by her phrontistes Papnouthos. November 23, 590. - 5. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 59. Unidentified document. February 18 (?), 594. - 6. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 78. Document addressed to Flavia Anastasia by Aurelius Ioustos. 591/2 or later.
bibl.seg: HICKEY Todd M. and Brendan J. HAUG, The Dossier of Flavia Anastasia, Part One: Document Prescripts. Avec résumé en anglais.

Six document prescripts from the dossier of Flavia Anastasia, an Oxyrhynchite landholder attested in the last quarter of the sixth century. - 1. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 44. Document addressed to Flavia Anastasia by georgoi from a ktema of hers. September 26, 587. - 2. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 55. Receipt for a charitable benefaction (?). 587/8. - 3. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 58. Document addressed to Flavia Anastasia by Aurelius Kelouch. April 16, 590. - 4. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 41. Document addressed to Flavia Anastasia by her phrontistes Papnouthos. November 23, 590. - 5. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 59. Unidentified document. February 18 (?), 594. - 6. P. bibl. univ. Giss. Inv. 78. Document addressed to Flavia Anastasia by Aurelius Ioustos. 591/2 or later.
